import React from "react"; import {NavLink} from "react-router-dom"; const NavBar = (): JSX.Element => { return (
{/* light and dark mode button */} {/* mobile toggle button */}
{/* header items two for large screens */}
  • Accueil
  • A propos
  • Mes parcours
  • Mes projets
  • Blogs
) } export default NavBar;
